data: Flood risk index related to mobility and accessibility
Flood risk index related to mobility and accessibility when streets around the houses are flooded
condition: streets around the houses are flooded
defined by: grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks
Circulation method (gravity, forced, ...) of water in canalisation pipe
State (faulty, cracked, ... ) of pipe connection in plastic with a diametre of 30 cm.
DRVA Direction of radial velocity of water current relative to instrument and to True North by high frequency radar
Direction of radial velocity of water current relative to instrument and to True North by high frequency radar.
ESPC Radial velocity (away from) standard deviation over the scatter patch of water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar
Standard deviation of the radial velocity (away from) standard deviation over the scatter patch of water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar
ETMP Radial velocity (away from) standard deviation of water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar
Standard deviation Radial velocity (away from) inof water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar, evaluated over the coverage period
EWCT Eastward velocity of water current in the water body by high frequency radar
Eastward velocity of water current in the water body by high frequency radar that is directed eastward (positive values) or westward (negative values)
Geometric dilution of precision of the relative position, based on the position of the receiver and the transmitters.
HCSS Radial velocity variance of water current relative to instrument  in the water body by high frequency radar
Radial velocity variance of water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar
NSCT Northward velocity of water current in the water body by high frequency radar
Component of the sea surface current velocity that is directed northward (positive values) or southward (negative values)
RDVA Radial velocity (away from) of water current relative to instrument in the water body by High Frequency Radar
Component of the sea surface current velocity that is directed toward (negative values) or away from (positive values) the High Frequency Radar (HFR) antenna.
UVAD Eastward velocity average in the water by a moored acoustic doppler current profile (ADCP)
Eastward velocity average in the water by a moored acoustic doppler current profile measured in (m s-1)
QC flags for radial velocity variance of water current, good data flag for those whose temporal variance is smaller than a maximum variance threshold.

current weight in kilogram without clothes; in case of pregnancy: last weight before pregnancy

Mass concentration of endosulfane sulfate in wet flesh of ostrea edulis, measured in μg/kg.
Body; mass index-> surface density; calculated by dividing body mass by height squared -> defined by: height squared; ADD: patient
BPM mean heart rate (beats per minute, ECG-derived)

mass density of a 10.00 mL sample of ACS reagent grade (99.0 (v/v)) benzene at a room temperature
determination of iron concentration in a soil sample by colorimetric analysis using ortho-phenanthroline
molarity of iron(II) derived from a soil sample (via acid digestion and dilution) using a colorimetric reaction with o-phenanthroline and measurement of absorbance at 510 nm

energy released upon combustion of 99.98(w/w) pure hexanol in air at atmospheric pressure and atmospheric oxygen level.
melting point of naphthalene under standard conditions
thermodynamic temperature for the melting point (at the solid to liquid phase transition) of a known purity (99.12 (w/w) sample of naphthalene at atmospheric pressure

pH of a sample of apple juice using a solid-state pH electrode
solubility (g/L) of 99.82 (w/w) pure benzene in deionized water at phase equilibrium and 298.15 K
solubility of molecular oxygen from air in water
solubility of molecular oxygen from air in water with MilliQ (10.2MOhm) purity at local air conditions
solubility of naphthalene in water at room temperature
solubility measurement of napathalene in deionized water at room temperature by monitoring absorption at 279 nm
Type of blood in a blood sample

Atmospheric optical thickness of particulate organic matter at 550nm under ambient conditions.
Atmospheric boundary layer height defined by temperature inversion
Atmospheric boundary layer height defined by temperature inversion.
The amount of sky estimated to be covered by all cloud types.
Concentration of DDT impacted by industry
Concentration of DDT in a given year at a site impacted by industry.

date of last COVID-19 PCR test performed by a certified laboratory
Distance to nearest neighbour habitat patch

Distance to nearest neighbour habitat patch to measure the degree of connection of EUNIS habitats within a landscape. https://github.com/EuropaBON/EBV-Descriptions/entity/Terrestrial-Connectivity-of-terrestrial-ecosystem-habitat-types
Docosahexaenoic acid content per dry weight (DHA content/ C22:6 n-3 content)
The amount of docosahexaenoic acid relative to dry weight in an organism.
dose of applied nanomaterial internalised by a specific cell population (or per single cell) - particle number / cell area
the amount of the applied dose of nanomaterial - particle number per cell area - that has been internalised by a cell population (or per specific cell)
dose of applied nanomaterial internalised by a specific cell population (or per single cell) -mass per cell area
the amount of the applied dose of nanomaterial that has been internalised by a cell population, mass per cell area
Dynamic shear viscosity of polystyrene PS042
Dynamic shear viscosity of polystyrene PS042 under the testing conditions of DIN 51810-1.
Electron density in the solar wind
Density (particle per cm3) of electrons measured in the Solar Wind.
The total area (in ha) of feral-free enclosures. See https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/d936bfd5-d2f9-5107-bbf7-2bd18bbab42b
Foliage projective cover in the lower canopy strata
The proportion (percentage) of the ground area covered by foliage (or photosynthetic tissue) in the lower canopy strata.

Mass flux of carbon into soil from vegetation due to senescence, measured in kg m-2 s-1.
Maximum trunk char height due to fire, measured above ground.
Overnight stays in 3-star hotel near the sea shore
Number of nights in a 3-star hotel near the sea shore
Peak acceleration measured on the earth surface when facing seismic events, like earthquakes.

Part of terrestrial Ecosystem distribution of terrestrial EUNIS Habitats EBV, probability of occurrence of EUNIS habitats within contiguous spatial units (grid cells of 100x100 m) across the EU over 1 year time. https://github.com/EuropaBON/EBV-Descriptions/entity/Terrestrial-Ecosystem-distribution-of-terrestrial-EUNIS-Habitats
Resting systolic blood pressure in millimeters of mercury (mmHg)
Sheet resistance of layer of gold
The sheet resistance of a 5-nanometer-thick layer of gold.
Standard metabolic rate in mg of Oxygen per hour
The measure of an ectotherm animal's baseline metabolic rate (i.e. non-active, non-stressed) measured by the milligrams of oxygen consumed in a period of time of one hour.

Geographic azimuth (relative to true north) at a point observation location, of a horizontal line contained in a sedimentary rock bedding surface. The bedding surface must not be horizontal; the azimuth is reported such that the dip direction of the inclined bedding is to the right when facing in the azimuth direction.

Weight specific-ingestion Carbon rate at 15 °C. The amount of carbon consumed by an organism at non-limiting concentration of food relative to the individual dry weight measured at 15°C. It is expressed as μg C mg DW−1 h−1
Average number of persons without high school diploma during the last 3 years within a statistical unit
Average number of persons without high school diploma during the last 3 years in a statistical unit which is defined as a grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks
Fraction of flooded area around building
Fraction of flooded area above 30 cm water level within a 5 m buffer around an affected building
Labile detrital nitrogen concentration in the seabed
Labile detrital nitrogen concentration in the seabed in mmoleN/kg in sediment.
Mean sea level pressure expressed in Pa

total number of people living within a statistical unit which is defined as a grouping of homogeneous neighboring building blocks
Aircraft Angle of Attack measured in degrees. The angle at which a straight line from the leading edge to the training edge of an aircraft’s wing meets the relative wind.
Ratio of backscattered light from the cross-polarized channel to the backscattered light from the parallet-polarized channel.
mass concentration of ice in atmosphere measured in g/m3
